表格商品表的代码预览

drop index 商品与数量单位_FK on shop;

drop index 商品与类型_FK on shop;

drop index 商品与门店_FK on shop;

drop index 商品与状态_FK on shop;

drop index shop_PK on shop;

drop table if exists shop;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: shop */
/*==============================================================*/
create table shop
(
shopid varchar(50) not null,
stateid int,
storeid varchar(20),
unitid int,
gid int,
shopname varchar(100),
sBrand varchar(50),
weight int,
pictrueUrl varchar(100),
stockprice float(10),
bjmoney float(10),
hymoney float(10),
vipmoney float(10),
rxyprice float(10),
primary key (shopid)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: shop_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index shop_PK on shop
(
shopid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 商品与状态_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 商品与状态_FK on shop
(
stateid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 商品与门店_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 商品与门店_FK on shop
(
storeid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 商品与类型_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 商品与类型_FK on shop
(
gid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 商品与数量单位_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 商品与数量单位_FK on shop
(
unitid
);

alter table shop add constraint FK_商品与数量单位 foreign key (unitid)
references unit (unitid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table shop add constraint FK_商品与状态 foreign key (stateid)
references state (stateid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table shop add constraint FK_商品与类型 foreign key (gid)
references goodsType (gid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table shop add constraint FK_商品与门店 foreign key (storeid)
references store (storeid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
